scripts.build: npm run build-dev; npm run build-prod; npm run build-min
scripts.profile: node --prof --prof_lazy --log ./tests/profile/react-server.js; node-tick-processor v8.log | grep -v 'unknown code' > artifacts/profile-react-server.txt; rm v8.log
scripts.profile-react: node --prof --prof_lazy --log ./tests/profile/react.js; node-tick-processor v8.log | grep -v 'unknown code' > artifacts/profile-react.txt; rm v8.log
scripts.test: npm run build; npm run build-react; mocha tests/unit/* --compilers js:babel/register --timeout 15000; npm run bench
